Outbound SMB or WebDAV traffic originati.Data: Zeek conn.log, Zeek smb.log, Zeek http.log
Outbound SMB or WebDAV traffic originati.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log, smb.log (TCP 139, 445, UDP 137), and http.log (TCP 80, 443) for connections originating from internal network segments destined for external, non-corporate IP ranges. Identify connections where the destination IP is not known or expected. Use correlation analysis to link outbound SMB/WebDAV connections with suspicious internal events (e.g., email receipt, file opening).

Creation or modification of .LNK or .SCF.Data: Windows Event ID 4663, Windows Event ID 4688
Creation or modification of .LNK or .SCF.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4663 on endpoints for attempts to write/modify files with .lnk or .scf extensions. Correlate these events with process creation (Event ID 4688) to identify the source process. Analyze associated network connections (potentially using Zeek conn.log) to confirm external resource references using correlation analysis.
